title: Veterans Day 2025: What’s open, what’s closed, and how the US will observe holiday
description: Veterans Day 2025 falls on Tuesday, November 11, honoring military service. Most government offices, including post offices and DMVs, will close. Banks will be shut, but ATMs and online services remain accessible. Retailers and restaurants will largely operate, many offering veteran discounts. UPS and FedEx will have modified schedules. The next federal holidays are Thanksgiving and Christmas.

title: Stress primes brain hub to trigger freezing to new, unrelated fear cues
description: Stress’s benefits for the species come at the cost of long-term changes in defensive responses. For instance, it can exaggerate how you respond to a threat. If someone were attacked in a dark street, they could become afraid of any dark environment, like in movie theatres. This is called stress-enhanced fear learning

title: Vibe coding: Meta’s AI chief has advice for teens: Says they should spend time on..

He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding'—hands-on experimentation with AI—to gain a significant advantage in the future economy. This approach emphasizes rapid learning through prompting and refining AI outputs.

The experiment aims to prove the viability of gas-based fermentation in microgravity.

title: Microsoft techie laid off: Calls it a green light; 5 career comeback tips

Professionals can use severance for skills development and rebrand themselves. Embracing a portfolio career or side hustle offers new paths. Shifting from victim to architect of one's career is key.
